name: dont KILL THEM.
description:
dont KILL THEM.

To whom it may concern,

Welcome to our simulation. Here, you will take part in a series of puzzles designed to test:

  • Your intelligence levels
  • Your morality towards assets
  • Your ethical code
Documentation

The following information is human input for observing desired output:

WASD - Movement
Left-Click & Right-Click (J + L) - Switch between Cubes

See the video below to familiarise yourself with the working environment.
